question: Your photograph recently won a photography competition and will be shown in an exhibition. Write a letter to your friend. In your letter. describe the photograph you sent to the competition. tell him/her about the exhibition where your photo will be shown. invite him/her to the exhibition
text: Hope you are doing well. Firstly, I am delighted to share the good news with you that I have won a photography competition. In addition, it will be displayed in the annual art exhibition, which is to be held on 15 January 2022.

The photograph that won the place was taken some time back when I happen to visit a famous waterfall in Sri Lanka. Indeed, it was  blissful scenery and the photo looked amazing. Hence, I decided to send it to the competition to see my luck, and to my surprise, it was selected.

Moreover, I am very excited to take part in the exhibition, where there will be a massive audience from various countries. Further, I really want you to be present on this special day, and the event will be held at the town hall auditorium from 9 am onwards.
I am looking forward to seeing you soon.
